description: This file defines URL patterns for a Django web application, mapping URLs to view functions or class-based views related to health checks, authentication, and note management.

classes.name: UserRegistrationView
classes.description: Handles user registration API endpoint, likely a Django class-based view.

classes.name: UserLoginView
classes.description: Handles user login API endpoint, likely a Django class-based view.

classes.name: UserLogoutView
classes.description: Handles user logout API endpoint, likely a Django class-based view.

classes.name: NoteListCreateView
classes.description: Handles creating new notes and listing existing notes via API.

classes.name: NoteRetrieveUpdateDestroyView
classes.description: Handles retrieving, updating, or deleting a specific note.
